1.SceneDescription:
Ross’s Wedding, continued from last season, the Minister is about to marry
Ross and Emily.

lines.Line:
Friends. Family. We are gathered to celebrate here today the joyous
union of Ross and Emily. (Time lapse) Now Ross, repeat after me. I Ross..

Take thee, Rachel...(All his friends have looks of shock on their faces.
He realizes what he said. Quickly he says.) Emily. (A slight chuckle.) Emily

(Looking and feeling awkward. he looks towards Emily.) Uhh...Shall I
go on

(To the woman sitting in front of her) He-he said Rachel, right? Do you
think I should go up there

I think we’d better start again. Ross, repeat after me. I,
Ross

Take thee, (Glares at the Minister) Emily. (Chuckles) Like
there’d be anybody else. (Emily is glaring at him.

As my lawfully wedded wife, in sickness and in health, till death
parts us

As my lawfully wedded wife, in sickness and in health, until death parts
us. Really, I do. Emily. (Points at her.

May I have the rings? (He is given the rings) Emily, place this ring
on Ross’s finger as a symbol of your bond everlasting. (She jams the ring onto his
finger) Ross, place this ring in Emily’s hand as a symbol of the love that encircles
you forever

Ross and Emily have made their declarations and it gives me great
pleasure to declare them husband and wife

lines.Character:
(He goes to kiss her, but she isn’t very receptive of the kiss. She keeps avoiding
him, until Ross finally gets to kiss her on her cheek
lines.Line:
He goes to kiss her, but she isn’t very receptive of the kiss. She keeps avoiding
him, until Ross finally gets to kiss her on her cheek.
(To Mr. Geller) This is worse than when he married the lesbian

lines.Character:
(The band starts to play, and the recessional starts. Ross tries to take Emily’s
hand, but she snatches it away from him
lines.Line:
The band starts to play, and the recessional starts. Ross tries to take Emily’s
hand, but she snatches it away from him.
It could’ve been worse, he could’ve shot her

lines.Character: (Ross and Emily make it to the lobby
lines.Line: Ross and Emily make it to the lobby.

lines.Character: (Ross and Emily make it to the lobby
lines.Line: Ross and Emily make it to the lobby.
(laughs) That uh, that was pretty funny. Wasn’t it

2.SceneDescription: London Marriott, Monica and Chandler are walking to her room.

lines.Line:
Listen, in the middle of everything if I scream the word,
"Yippee!" just ignore me

lines.Character: (She laughs and opens the door to reveal Rachel sitting on the bed
lines.Line: She laughs and opens the door to reveal Rachel sitting on the bed.

Ross said my name. Okay? My name. Ross said my name up there that
obviously means that he still loves me! (They both just stare at her.) Okay, don’t
believe me, I know I’m right—do you guys want to go downstairs and get a drink
Yes, we do. But, we have to change first

Yes, I want to change. And why-why don’t you go down and get us a
table
Yeah, we’ll be down in like five minutes
Yeah, we’ll be down in like five minutes

lines.Character: (The phone rings and Rachel answers it
lines.Line: The phone rings and Rachel answers it.
Hello? Oh, Pheebs! (To them) It’s Phoebe
Yeah, I know, but I don’t think that means anything

Okay, Pheebs, y’know what, let’s look at this objectively all
right? Ninth grade, right? The obsession starts. All right? The summer after ninth grade
he sees me in a two-piece for the first time, his obsession begins to grow. So then
(To Monica) Hey, listen, why don’t we go change in my room
(To Monica) Hey, listen, why don’t we go change in my room
But my clothes are—ohh! (They both leave.

lines.Character:
(Cut to Chandler’s room, he opens the door slowly to see if Joey is there and
after seeing that he isn’t, ushers Monica into the room, closes the door, and the
security bar
lines.Line:
Cut to Chandler’s room, he opens the door slowly to see if Joey is there and
after seeing that he isn’t, ushers Monica into the room, closes the door, and the
security bar.

lines.Character:
(They both start to frantically rip each other’s clothes off, but are interrupted
when Joey tries to open the door
lines.Line:
They both start to frantically rip each other’s clothes off, but are interrupted
when Joey tries to open the door.
Hey, dude, let me in. I got a girl out here
Well, I’ve got a girl in here
Well, I’ve got a girl in here
No you don’t, I just saw you go in there with Monica
Well, we’re-we’re hanging out in here
Well, we’re-we’re hanging out in here
Look, which one of us is gonna be having sex in there, me or you

Well, I suppose I’d have to say you!! But, what if we’re
watching a movie in here
Which we are, and-and we already paid for it. It’s My Giant

3.SceneDescription:
Ross and Emily’s room, the next morning. Ross is now asleep and has his
head in Monica’s lap and his feet on Chandler’s lap. Monica and Chandler are
both still awake and depressed.

lines.Line: We have to leave for New York in an hour

I know, I’ve been looking at those doors, they look pretty sound
proof, don’t you think

We can’t do that that’s insane. I mean ‘A’ he
could wake up and ‘B’ y’know, let’s go for it

lines.Character:
(They both try to slowly extricate themselves from Ross, but there’s a knock on
the door that awakens him
lines.Line:
They both try to slowly extricate themselves from Ross, but there’s a knock on
the door that awakens him.

Em-Emily? (Looking around for her.) Em-Emily? (He runs to the door.)
Emily! (He opens the door to reveal the Walthams standing outside.
You can forget about Emily, she’s not with us

She’s in hiding. She’s utterly humiliated. She
doesn’t want to see you ever again

We’re very sad that it didn’t work out between you and
Emily, monkey. But, I think you’re absolutely delicious
Excuse me, I’m standing right here
Excuse me, I’m standing right here

(entering, carrying an armful of those little soaps.) Hey-hey, you guys
oh hurry up, get some, there’s a whole cart outside… (Sees the Walthams and
stops.

Now, hold on! Hold on! (Stops him) Look, look, your daughter and I are
supposed to leave tonight for our honeymoon, now-now you-you tell her that I’m gonna
be at that airport and I hope that she’ll be there too! Oh yeah, I said Rachel’s
name, but it didn’t mean anything, Okay? She’s-she’s just a friend and
that’s all! (Rachel sits down, depressed.) That’s all! Now just tell Emily that
I love her and that I can’t imagine spending my life with anyone else. Please,
promise me that you’ll tell her that
All right, I’ll tell her. (To his wife) Come on bugger face
(As she walks pass Ross, she pats his but.) Call me

You spend half your life in the bathroom, why don’t you ever
go out the bloody window

4.SceneDescription:
Monica and Rachel's, Phoebe is eating cereal from a bowl she has balanced on
her stomach as Joey, Chandler, and Monica return.

lines.Line:
(To Joey) You ate meat! (Joey is shocked) (To Chandler and Monica) You
had sex! (They’re shocked.
I know you didn’t, I was talking about Monica
Phoebe, I did not have sex
Phoebe, I did not have sex
This pregnancy is throwing me all off
All right, I’m gonna go say hi the chick and the duck
All right, I’m gonna go say hi the chick and the duck

Why would you need to say hi to them, you’ve been feeding them for
four days
Oh right, maybe I’ll just go home.

lines.Character:
(She grabs her bag and leaves, Joey moves a little quicker to his apartment, leaving
Monica and Chandler alone
lines.Line:
She grabs her bag and leaves, Joey moves a little quicker to his apartment, leaving
Monica and Chandler alone.
Yes! Good thing we have that, ‘Not in New York’ rule

Right. Umm, listen since we’re-we-re on that subject, umm, I just
wanted to tell you that uh, well, I-I was going through a really hard time in London, what
with my brother getting married and that guy thinking I was Ross’s mother

Well, an-anyway, I just—that night meant a lot to me, I guess
I’m just trying to say thanks

Oh. Y’know, that night meant a lot to me too, and it wasn’t
because I was in a bad place or anything, it just meant a lot to me ‘cause,
you’re really hot! Is that okay
Thank you! (They hug.) All right, I gotta go unpack

lines.Character:
(After he closes the door, Monica starts to follow him, but thinks better of it and
stops
lines.Line:
After he closes the door, Monica starts to follow him, but thinks better of it and
stops.
(entering) I’m still on London time, does that count

5.SceneDescription: Flight 1066 to Athens, Rachel is ordering a drink for Ross and herself.

lines.Line:
Ahh, yes, I will have a glass of the Merlot and uh, (points to
Ross’s seat.) he will have a white wine spritzer. Woo! (Looks out the window.) Hey,
look at that, the airport’s moving. (Realizes that that’s not how it works.)
Hey, are we moving?! Are we moving? Why are we moving? Hey, time-out, umm, yeah, does the
captain know that we’re moving? (Sits back in defeat.) Oh my God. Oh, my gosh
